title: PLS FCKING NERF KATARINA
body: PLS NERF THIS SON OF A BETCH MOTHERFKING CHAMP. DUN TELL ME BS LIKE CC COUNTERS HER ALL THOSE BS AS IF THERE ISN'T A CHAMP THAT DOESN'T GET COUNTERED BY CC. EVERY SINGLE TIME I JUST GET ONE SHOT BY THIS BETCH.

replies.body: don't talk about balance when you're an unranked shitter please.

um bud I was once plat 4 but I started to get less and less time to play this game now im bronze some shit cos I only play a few games a week and most of the time its with a 4 man team so no ranked just cos your ranked or unranked don't mean shit  yes this guy is probs bad as he is complaining about kat that had had several nerfs this year but being ranked means shit so don't talk bout being some number 1 player in the wold means anything some of the best players don't even play ranked some of witch are in lcs

Kat's fine honestly. It's the 6 year old Teddy bear bitch that's the problem

and as for you Kats not op atm if you feed her yes she gets op but only wen you feed her look at yas if you can shut him down in the first 10 to 15 min then late game he will do 0 damage but if you feed him he gona 1v5 your team same with riven yi tryndamere garen so on  noobs nubs or newbies like you just don't have the skill or knowledge to  play agenst theses champs and just run in wen there strongest kill a kat before she gets lv 6 and she will do 0 damage for most of the game and if you loss lane then go help the other lanes if there fed then get them more kills by turning a 1v1 to a 1v2 or a 1v3 with a jg helping you gank then you get fed your team gets fed and you just single handed one the game as you got your team fed witch made a snow ball or you can wait and get ganks from your jg think first then act
